title: Defines planned retirement community and proscribes rules and regulations for ownership and operation in Suffolk county
summary: Sets up rules and regulations for the operation of planned retirement communities in Suffolk county to provide adequate housing for senior citizens wishing to retire and locate in a planned retirement community; grants owners of homes in planned retirement communities in Suffolk county the right to sell their homes by methods common to sales of residential property; requires that owners of planned retirement communities in Suffolk county offer owners of homes the option to sign a long-term ninety-nine year lease.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to planned retirement communities in Suffolk county
